properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 8:34AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At
Gainesville Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis
Lock and Dam...

.Flooding continues along the Tombigbee River following recent
heavy rainfall...and a flood warning remains in effect along the
river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8:15 AM Thursday the stage was 75.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 76.7 feet by
Saturday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 77 feet...Flooding of numerous cabins and trailers
near the river can be expected. Widespread flooding of lowlands in
the area will continue.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
